headline: Is Analog Devices Stock Still a Smart Choice After Its Strong 2025 Rally?
summary: Thinking of what to do with Analog Devices stock? You are not alone. It is tempting to look at its impressive multi-year run and wonder if now is the time to buy, sell, or simply watch. Over the past 5 years, Analog Devices’ price has soared by 134.8%, with a 3-year gain of 72.6%. That is a track record any investor would notice. More recently, the stock has posted a solid 15.9% gain year-to-date and 11.6% over the last year, even as it dipped slightly by 1.6% in the past week. These moves...
